# Value

**Associated Type**

The type of value provided to the template.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Value
```

## Discussion

When you create a custom provider, Swift infers this type from your implementation of the required [doc://com.apple.WidgetKit/documentation/WidgetKit/ControlValueProvider/previewValue] property and [doc://com.apple.WidgetKit/documentation/WidgetKit/ControlValueProvider/currentValue()] method.
title: Value
